ai-iti4:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti4:2.4_0: Anger is the one thing. Give it up,
ai-iti4:3.2_0: sentient beings go to a bad place,
ai-iti4:3.5_0: They give up food and drink,
ai-iti4:3.6_0: in this world with its gods.”
ai-iti4:4.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
